\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	{X^n \oplus X^{n-1}} & {X^{n+1}\oplus X^n} & {F(X)} & X & {X^n} & {X^{n+1}} \\
	{M^n} & {M^{n+1}} & {(M,d)} & {U(M,d)} & {M^n} & {M^{n+1}}
	\arrow["{\binom{0 \ 0}{1 \ 0}}", from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["{f^n\circ (1,d)}"', from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["{f^{n+1}\circ (1,d)}"', from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow[""{name=0, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow[""{name=1, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{f^n}"', from=1-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow["{f^{n+1}}"', from=1-6, to=2-6]
	\arrow["d"', from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{1:1}", between={0.2}{0.8}, Rightarrow, 2tail reversed, from=0, to=1]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
